TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed GestureState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates the phase that a gesture is currently in.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype GameStack.GestureState Cancel = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The gesture has been cancelled. On some systems, this means the touch moved outside a specific area, a hardware button is pressed, or any other action that interrupts a gesture in progress.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype GameStack.GestureState Change = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The gesture is continuing and has been updated with new info. For example, a swipe's distance may be updated over time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype GameStack.GestureState End = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype GameStack.GestureState Start = int32(0)

Docs.summary: A new gesture is beginning and may either end successfully or be cancelled.
